author: ein-g GmbH
description: Online Patent and Trademark Management, Address Management, Time Tracking, Invoicing and Team Collaboration. File management including: data of Patents, European Patents, PCT, Utility Models, Design Patents, Trade Marks, Contracts and Inventions, and other files Letters: The address of the addressee will be automatically adapted to the country standards of address format of the receipient. Address management: all your addresses of companies and contact persons are always available for your team members. At any time and anywhere. Management of due dates and reminders: monitor all due dates and reminders at a glance. Templates for reminders: Create your own reminder templates and have the system create reminders for you automatically. Time Tracking: all team members enter their times worked. Decide about hourly rates and debit it later. Invoicing: Create invoices accounting accrued efforts based on hourly rates and office fees. Debit the positions within a debit note. Spare some positions for later debiting if needed. Import of online filed data: simply take the European Patent Application as you filed it online and upload it to Renaissance. The imported data is matched against already existing contacts preventing redundant entries and a files is cerated. Export: export your data to common spread-sheet applications like for example Excel. Full text search: find files, patents or addresses with the full text search. Amazingly fast and easy. Management of fees and annuities: for European Patents and PCT. Remind your clients about annuities due and pay the annuities just in time within the Renaissance annuity management. Permissions: Decide which team member should have access to which data. Renaissance lets you define granular permissions if you wish or you may leave it open for everyone. No local Installation: Use Renaissance from any browser on any desktop. No need to install anything - just enter the right url and start working.
name: ein-g Renaissance
